overview: On December 5, the legendary Flemish actress Chris Lomme turns 80. A reason for KVS director Michael De Cock to make a performance with her about aging and saying goodbye: 'Reverence'. It will hit theaters in 2019. Canvas follows the creation process and creates an intimate portrait on universal themes. But as Chris always says, "Getting old is the only way to live long."
title: Chris Lomme, een Reverence
